brief: Winter Olympics in full swing: Johaug races for gold at 09:00, ski jumping at 16:00.
Liverpool chases title at Sunderland tonight; Arsenal travels to Brentford Thursday.
Klaebo's sprint free Friday is Norway's best gold chance; Riiber dominates Nordic Combined.

items.text: Today: Women's 10km Classic (09:00), Ski Jumping Normal Hill (16:00)
Thu: Boe brothers in 20km biathlon; Kristoffersen/Braathen giant slalom
Fri: Klaebo sprint free ‚Äî Norway's signature event and best medal chance

expandItems.text: Sat: Roeiseland 15km biathlon; Kilde downhill at legendary Bormio
Sun: Klaebo 50km marathon ‚Äî the most prestigious cross-country race
Sun: Granerud large hill ski jumping final
Mon: Men's biathlon relay with Boe brothers hunting team gold
Tue: Kristoffersen/Braathen slalom ‚Äî both capable of Olympic gold

radar: Hovland tees off Sunday at Pebble Beach, one of golf's most scenic venues and a chance to build momentum early in the PGA season.
Ruud's clay season approaches with Monte Carlo and Roland Garros on the horizon; Norwegian chess fans await Carlsen's next classical tournament appearance.
Lyn Oslo's OBOS-ligaen campaign restarts in March as Norway's second tier prepares for spring football.
